Description: Granodiorite libation-bowl of Mentuemhat; Hathor-head on the rim; Hieroglyphic text.
Curator's comments: Published: Art and Afterlife in Ancient Egypt (Japan 1999-2000): No 131 PM I Part 2: p.841-842
Exhibition history: 2022 27 April – 25 July, Paris, Musée du Louvre, Pharaoh of the Two Lands
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
